## **Course Overview**

> This course provides an introduction to important topics in statistical concepts and reasoning essential to quantitative medical research. 
> This course is lectured by a total of four faculty:
>
>   - Week 1 to 5: **Dr. Boncho Ku**
>   - Week 6 to 9: **Dr. Mimi Ko**
>   - Week 10 to 12: **Dr. Myeong Soo Lee**
>   - Week 13 to 14: **Dr. Junhwan Lee**
